title: Bloomberg Markets: Cirrotti on DOL Fiduciary Rule
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cirrotti on DOL Fiduciary Rule
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Robert Cirrotti\u0010Managing Director and Head of Retirement Investment Solutions\u0010Pershing\u0010Discussing the DOL fiduciary rule as a reflection point for the financial industry from Pershing Insite 2017 in San Diego.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
